reviews.review:
他のプレイヤーと協力してゾンビっぽい生物兵器を殲滅するのが目的のゲーム。
基本的にキャンプしてヘッドショットしかすることが無いのだが、銃の反動や敵を倒した際のリアクションなど射撃に関する要素が優れており、また敵の種類が多いために倒す優先度、使う武器、味方との位置取りなど考える要素も多く、その面白さに一度ハマれば抜け出せないスルメゲーである。
Best 3rd person Shooter Eva
This games is so worth the DOSH.
Lots of co-op, gib spattering fun.

Fun. Left 4 Dead but also CounterStrike but also neither of these things. Find places that give you the tactical advantage, gear up then blast mutant things. 

Teamwork! Stepping in the way of a friendy grenade sometimes!
So many guns what do different things!
Classes - which are only moderately a pain in the arse to level up!
Lots of levels!
Devs are pretty nice folks!
British people!
Lots of dosh! And tossing said dosh!

Get the fuck in!
Zombies too close for grenade launcher, switching to full-auto shotguns!
Great Game

A great game! A team of 6 people fighting off 7 or 10 waves of specimens, each wave harder than the last with new monsters added on nearly every one of them. After clearing wave 7 or 10 (short game/long game) you'll face the Patriarch aka the boss...hardest enemy ever, but nothing a few well placed pipebombs and a good team won't take care of :D also this game has a class/perk system. Every perk has a number of things you need to do, and once the numbers are met the perk levels up granting you better abilities, more damage or on the final levels a better gun to start with or some body armor. It might not be perfect for your tastebuds but I seriously recommend at least giving it a try :P
For intense gameplay it's hard to beat Killing Floor. I've played for over 500 hours and still feel like I could be even better. Good price for a good game.
Carefull with that knife, he might hurt somebody.
ﾊﾞｰﾍﾞｷｭｰﾄｩﾅｲ?
so far its brought me 77.7 hrs  of fuckin fun dammit:)!!!!
Mindless FPS shoot em up. Game play is klunky, graphics are sketchy, and there's not much else to it. Plot is non-existant. It's just arena style monster killing wave after wave.
Essayer c'est l'adopter !

i Have played Killing Floor for around 2-3 years straight, and only now am i getting a little bored of it. This creation from the unreal engine, is completley satisfying for a survival zombie game. ALTHOUGH it is not a traditional zombie survival game, its is still the funnest IF NOT THE BEST zed based game i have EVER PLAYED. THe pure comical action with the witty and slandish british comedy that riddles the game is fantastic, and the FPS mechanics are just perfect (although there are a few glitches in the system when changing weapons and such, but this is mainly due to the inferiority of the engine not that actual game, and they are quite bearable)

The Visuals are decent, not fantasitic or amazing, but they will satisfy you, for the game itself makes up for that. The gore is perfect, everyshot fired feels real, and satisfying, the headshots that you will lay into the zeds are fullfilling and many. The variety of zeds are also fullfilling, with a total of 10 different types of zeds (this is not including the Patriarch which is a large overpowered macho boss that you will encounter at the end of each match), in which all are completley different from one another. In the tradition of zombie survival games, the multiplayer capabilities are just great, they are solid, perfected and polished. A total of 6 players can be in a server at a time, to which there can be one of each class (exempt one). There are seven different classes to which are all different in which all can have class specific weapons (although the support specialist and the commando seem to be quite similar).

There are 5 diferent difficulties (begginer, normal, hard, suicidal, hell on earth) to which their titles suggest exactly what they are, the first two difficulties are fairly easy to take by yourself if you are a faitrly experienced player, but the rest are quite difficult EVEN FOR A FULL SERVER OF GOLD RANKED PLAYERS (also whichin each class there are six ranks (the sixth is gold)). There is definalty great replayability in this game, as to reach gold rank it will take you quite some time. Personally for me to get to a gold rank demolitionist took me around a year for playing around 4 hours an afternoon (and not every afternoon), but if you do not want to put in the hours for the reward, there are a variety of FARMING maps in the community, and ever since steam created the workshop for KF, the community has grown greatly.

I give killing floor a 7/10. (ALSO KF 2 IS COMING OUT SOON! AND LOOKS GREAT, YOU MAY WANT TO WAIT FOR THAT IF THIS DOESNT CATCH YOUR FANCY INSTANTLY)
As a coop horde shooter its pretty fun, lots of different weapons and perks to use and best of all the game is very playable if you have no one to play with.
16 + awesome weapons and zombies
Chainsaws, shotguns, crossbows, and katanas. The original survival horror game.
Uma das fontes de inspiração da franquia Left 4 Dead. Divertidíssimo e oferece coop de 6 pessoas.
Left 4 Dead:  The RPG-FPS.  A great game to play with a group of friends, not nearly as fun with a group of randoms.
awful kiddie game

Junte zumbis e outros monstros e multiplayer entre amigos e está feito um ótimo jogo. Misture compra de armas, evolução de personagens, outros chars e temos Killing Floor, um dos melhores games de tiro/zumbi, junto com Left 4 Dead.
BUY IT! for fuck sake! if u dont buy it... WHATS WRONG WITH YOU?!!!! its the best zombie game of all time!

Unforgiving and brutal. This game pushes players to the limits of individual and team skill. Playing solo, or in the public multiplayer, is not recommended.

It has problems - the graphical fidelity of the Unreal 2.5 engine was great in 2008, maybe, and there are severe balance issues - but the core of the game is still tactical and challenging. Each map generally requires a unique strategy, with certain class combinations performing better depending on the map and strategy chosen.

The developer is still adding (small) content updates like maps, and running seasonal updates, this far into the game's lifespan. Not bad.

Update: Content updates have finished with the developers focusing on the sequel.

With friends, 9/10 highly recommended. Without, skip.
a.w.e.s.o.m.e

Jogo legal, porem pode ser bastante dificil no inicio, o jogo ñ segue o mesmo gênero que outros jogos, esse tem um sistema de classes bem legal mais pode se dizer queo jogo depois de algum tempo ñ tem muito sentido e pode vir a ser bem enjoativo, mais Recomendo assim mesmo! se fosse dar uma nota de 1 a 10 daria 7! ;P
one of my fav games! loving just to fuck around and do random shit. blowing up zeds with my m32 and yelling at pictures that make me have a face liek this: >:|=0
One of the funnest games to play with friends

Really good co-op game. Its not easy to win you have to try hard  and look at who's doing close cooperation is the key to success.I sincerely recommend low hardware requirements,close cooperation,a lot of maps and the ability to add new ones offer a huge portion fun for hours. Just try it you will not regret

Wave based zombie shoot-em-up with a large focus on co-op and classes. Great atmosphere, worth the 20 bucks on steam.

Not particularly computer heavy, and it has a fair few active online servers for any difficulty (Even in Australia)

Игра конечно не шедевр, но внутреннее чувство, что возможно еще одну волну ты не продержишься и будешь разорван на куски толпой разномастных монстров, я еще месяц не забуду.Сильно порадовало некоторое оружие и отсутствие прицела, а так же финальная схватка с Патриархом, который постоянно выкрикивает какой-то бред, вроде ''Вы заплатите за то, что сделали со мной!!!'' и делает какую-ниубдь бяку, отнимающую половину здоровья. Особенно с ним было весело поначалу, когда я еще не знал, на что способен этот мутагенный очкарик.

great game,very addictive & intense game play.This game has a good perk system with a decent character selection and a wide verity of weapons for each perk,there is also a healthy selection of maps to choose from.Team play is a must along with good communication,without it you will not survive.

this game also comes with a level creator if that tickles your fancy :p

nice Co-Op if you get some friends or good players on it)

the more realistic version of left 4 dead 2   very fun, very challenging, and very addicting, this game is a must have for anyone/everyone
Left 4 dead, only with british people. Plus the pyro from TF2.

Counter-Strike Source meets Call of Duty: Nazi Zombies with a dash of your favorite B-Grade science fiction/horror movie thrown in, Killing Floor is a plotless romp of pure fun and mutant-gibbing madness through post-apocalypse Britain, and is recommended for fans of the zombie genre, the FPS genre and anyone with a pulse.
Best game of all Times!
Awesomely FUN!!!
cool

Sure the game looks shitty for a 2009-ner, but i can garanteed you to have fun if you like survival and coop with friends, 6 men coop with various weapons and gameplay style all up to you and your mates, every perk has its own purpose and merits, Berserkers can take on large group or one single tough Speciman. Sharpshooters take out vital targets with precision and deadlyness, Commandos reveals enemy health and hidden threats such as the Patriarch and Stalker, Firebugs thin out mobs to clear ways for teammates, Support Specialist, just as the name suggested, supports his teammates with high firepowered shotguns and can carry extra weapons, Demoliton, best for taking down large group of enemies, whether big or small, in the matter of seconds, lasty, and my personal favourite, Field Medic, heals his teammates with better effeciencies, move faster and can tank his teammates if needed. I highly recommend this game, although i still wish that Tripwire can update the game a lil bit more.
Да, блеать!=)
Really funny zombie coop slash game :) Worth the money 8/10
Like totally buy this shit.. 10/10
Super addicting fun.
I love this game. It's like Nazi Zombies on steroids.

Das Spiel kann schon mit L4D mithalten, da haste im Game wenigstens richtige Zombies mit Herausvorderungen auch wenn´s leicht an CSS erinnert was aber nichts schlimmes ist. Auf jeden fall empfehlenswert!

Raw first person survival horror.  This game takes a few plays and a bit of basic know-how before you truly begin to like it.  Incredibly fun game that is more challenging than most, considering it has 5 difficulties, the final 3 (hard, suicidal, hell on earth, respectively) are incredibly hard.  This game is worth the 20$ or some such price, trust me.

One of the best underdog stories in recent gaming history. Made by the fantastic group of guys who made Red Orchestra Ostfront (and soon to release Heroes of Stalingrad) took an interesting turn and created this very fun game. Its a great co-op first person shooter and a must buy for any fan of the 'zombie' culture.

Think of Killing Floor as a serious Left 4 Dead with a hint of rpg (different classes with unique skill sets such as engineer, sniper, etc.) and a fucking dope sound track.

Thought this game would be similar to L4D when I got it for cheap, but was quickly disappointed.  So many down sides to the gameplay for me, but I think its supposed to be a First Person tower defense game.  One of the greatest challenges of the game is to stop killing zeds at round end, hustle to some hidden store to buy ammo and new guns before the new zeds approach.  The thought that goes into this one is above blowing your nose but below pencil sharpening.

Had about 40 hours in this game, not sure why my hours are off, but there is a period where steam didn't keep track of mine properly.

Take away the guns, models, monsters, maps, and style from this Unreal Tournament 2004 mod and what you end up with is where your started, Unreal Tournament 2004 Invasion. 

It's not boring and repetitive like Brainbread where you pop easy heads behind sandbags with Sawnoffs for 25 minutes or Sven Co-op where you go Rambo race to the end of the default HL campaign maps. There's variables like weapon, amount of money, perk, strengths, weaknessess, health, map location, weapon skill, healing skill, game difficulty, and even the type and amount of monsters approaching to test your target priority.

Take those and multiply it by 6 to account to a full perked server, maybe with mods, and you'll see why Killing Floor has to be the finest defensive co-op I've seen in a long time, because with all the possibly bad spawns and bad moves and choices, this is what co-op is intended to be. 

And it only costs a month of Doritos and soda, so you'll have enough to buy a microphone too help out more..
Good class-based horror survival shooter. Almost makes grinding fun...?
Black Ops zombie mode has nothing on this game, which does it far...far better.  Also, it's raining money!

Killing Floor is one of the best games i have ever played. Its simplicity is astounding but it is its simplicity that makes the game fun. Generally speaking I am the guy who likes customizable shooters ones with depth of story and large numbers of different weapons to choose from. This game has none of that. But it is still one of the most fun games i have ever played. 
Graphics: 8/10
Audio: 4/10
Controls: 10/10 (you can change them to whatever so no complaints)
Difficulty: 10/10 (The game bases difficulty very well per setting allowing new players to get eased into the game not just thrown to the wolves to die and give up or live and get better, and veterans to not get bored.)
Replayability: 10/10 thats all this game is really.
Must have!
L4D in a box with RPG elements. whats not to like?
All I can say is.... Kick....Ass...Game!
super game, macht echt immer wieder fun ein paar zombieköpfe abzuballern ^^
You kill dudes while standing on the floor. It's incredible.
i dont play well with frends i farm
This is one Motherfucking BEAST ZOMBIE KILLING GAME! fuck yeah! i recommend you to try this beast game :)!

Great game. The story is there - sorta - but its good at what it wants you to do - kill everything. The plot doesn't get in the way. Shoot, stab, and bludgeon your way through hordes of enemies with little to no guidance. Play solo and be a lone wolf, or slightly modify your objectives to "Kill everything thats not on your team" and amuse yourself in that manner.
headshots  + slow mode = awesome!
Worth the money, Good co-op game. But gets abit boring :)
nastiest co-op game
gra jest super ale najlepjej grać wniej w sieci POLECAM

Fun game where you shoot mutant waves in order to survive. It's a bit brainless, but a lot of fun! There's different classes and teamwork involved. If you played any FPS game before, you should be able to pick it up and play without any trouble. 

You can also play as TF2's Pyro and everyone speaks british.

Возможно Killing Floor была бы более популярна, если бы Tripwire Interactive относилась к игре внимательней. Неплохая погружаемость в процесс, отлично смоделированные карты, звуки, шорохи, частые акции и обновления, хорошие монстры и оружие - все отличные элементы в этой игре смазывается ужасно долгой прокачкой, интересной только в первые несколько дней, корявостью интерфейса, платными скинами персонажей и однообразным геймплеем. Для не оригинального проекта Tripwire Interactive (а Killing Floor, напомню вам, изначально был модом для UT) качество слишком низкое.
楽しく、派手に、愉快に、盛大に、量で圧されて殲滅されるゲーム。ンッギモヂイイッ

calidad / precio inmejorable , horas y horas de juego online , niveles de juego como...normal , dificil , suicidad y infierno en la tierra O_O todos con un boss final  y cada perk es diferente con 6 niveles para elevar sus caracteristicas con hasta 27 armas diferentes....... ,los bichos se lanzan a por ti a mas les dispares, de lo mejor  de la mano de los creadores de Dead Island 100% recomendado
Buter des Zombies !!! c'est toujours un régal.
Awesome as fuck, if you want some intense shooting, look no further!

A Killing Floor egy kiemelkedő, egyedi alkotás. A 6 fős co-op, a zenék, a sok féle pálya, a különböző ellenfelek és nehézségi szintek együttese egy olyan játékot alkot, melybe 500-700 órát bele lehet ölni anélkül, hogy ráunna az ember, ha szereti a hentelést, az achievementek gyűjtögetését, kiakarja maxolni a 7 perket és van néhány jóbarátja, akivel mindezeket megteheti.
Great coop survival, admittedly I'm having more fun with this than with l4d

177 hours so far. It speaks for itself. - 8/23/11

This game never ceases to lose its fun factor. I really cannot explain it, but for some reason, after attaining each class at max rank I still come back for more. 525 hours in and still going strong while patiently awaiting Killing Floor 2.
Fun Game, but if not playing with perticular friends, and just on a random game, i find myself getting a sickeningly familiar message  "you are the last one left"
Polecam jest grubo:)
Killing Floor is a hell of a blast!
Great zombie/monster fps game.
Fun, then monotonous, then boring. A year down the line somebody will buy it and you'll all go on it and it's fun again, the cycle continues...
One of the bests survival horror out there

I was very disappointed with this game; I was expecting a renovation-simulator in which you resurface floors of rooms. You would first have to tear it apart (effectively killing it), then choose from a variety of floors to replace it. You'd get a variety; hardwood, marble, laminate, carpet and ceramic tiles,

If you overlook that flaw, it's not a bad game.

Tried it as a alternate to cod zombs. different feel, esp when I tried to find the "run" button. (there isn't one). Enjoying it immensely. Brits armed with everything from katanas to m-79's taking on the mutant horde. 
Biggest difference from cod zombs: there is an end to a match, when you take out the last tango. Nice change of pace, with more than 4 players supported for matches.

Not a noob friendly game thats for sure, if you want to survive in this game on any difficulty you have to know how to use your teammates as weapons because if you stand alone i guarentee 100% you won't survive. Trully great game made for gamers with expertise.

Killing Floor is basically CS:S' zombie mod. You hunker down in a corner somewhere and defend yourself from zombies. It's not like L4D where you're actually trying to get somewhere, in KF, you just try to stay alive. It can get intense, and you'll have to rely on people online to help you. 

Just make sure you have a few friends to play with, or you won't get past the first few waves.

6 player, Co-op Survival defence FPS.

6 Different character classes each with thier own perks and flaws: Beserker (melee), Firebug, Commando (SMGs and Assault Rifles), Support (shotgunner), Sharpshooter (scoped crossbow), Medic and Demolitions (Grenade/Rocket launcher),

Individual character levels. Complete milestones specific to that class which will increase the level of that class. Bringing weapon bonus' and price reductions. Max at level 6.
7 Difficulty options. As you progress in levels, ramp up the difficulty to retain the challenge.
Heaps of maps included in the game and hundreds more community maps online to download.

Large Variety of weapons: knife, machete, Fire axe, Katana, chainsaw, 9mm pistol, desert eagle, AK-47, Scar, Flamethrower, SMGs, Medic dart gun, Grenade launchers, Rocket Launcher, Crossbow, Lever Action Rifle, Pump Action/Double Barrel/Automatic Shotguns, Mac-10 with incendiary ammo and more...

Best played multi-player with friends.
Best zombie killing game around !!!
Dosh! Grab it while it's hot.

Killing Floor is fantastic if you're in the mood for a cooperative zombie romp. The objective is to survive all the waves of zombies and defeat the end boss. A simplistic approach, but the guns, gunplay, and action are a lot of fun.

Hundreds of zombies(whatsoever) put in a single map. Defend yourself against 4-10 Waves of zombies which after each wave you go to trader to resupply yourself with ammo and new guns. 7 totally different classes which you slowly upgrade into powerful zombie slashing beasts. TEAMWORK is the key, every class is good for the specific kind of a job so use it wisely.

The best Co-Op Survival Game i have personaly EVER played. The teamwork in this game is rather good unlike such games like Left 4 Dead.

The gameplay is really tense and the game itself is hard even on easy, But that's the entire point. Not to mention that the music in this game gives such a badass adrenaline boost. And the character modification in this game is great.

Fucking 10/10, You just gotta love Tripwire.

Awesome coop zombie killing game.  

Late Edit: Some of the last updates that the game got before they dropped support and started working on KF2 instead have been very disappointing. 
Some balance mess ups but mostly the Pay2Win weapon DLCs (yes, they are Pay2Win) and the fact that they made perk levels meaningless because they just whitelisted everything so beginners can cheat all their perks to max level on specially designed custom maps in less than an hour.  
Previously a perk level of 5 of 6 meant that the player had spent a considerable amount of time with the game/class and gained some experience and skill, now it means nothing because every beginner can be level 6.  
Looking at the most recent DLCs again and at KF2, it is clear that Tripwire Interactive has become a super greedy developer/publisher. I can still have fun with KF1 like in the old times but I'll never buy another game from this developer again.

Não se enganem pela aparência tosca desse jogo. É um dos melhores jogos que eu já joguei!
Os gráficos, animação e as vozes podem repelir ao primeiro olhar, mas todas as características básicas que fazem esse jogo um excelente shooter estão lá. Animação do recarregamento das armas, o equilíbrio das classes dos personagens e suas aplicações táticas em cooperação são fenomenais.
Jogo extremamente divertido. Não há nada mais emocionante que enfrentar o Patriarca.
